titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 313 East Main Street in Robstown, Texas, as the "Lieutenant Juan G. Carrion Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 7/28/2010--Introduced. Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 313 East Main Street in Robstown, Texas, as the "Lieutenant Juan G. Carrion Post Office Building."
